predicate: The BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig (field1) must match the bwp-id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config (field2)
notes: The BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in, which must match the bwp-id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config.

meta.evidence: - powerControlOffsetSS: which is the assumed ratio of NZP CSI-RS EPRE to SS/PBCH block EPRE. - scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits. - BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in.
